The image was shared on a public Faceboo: providing a clear timeline of when the claim was made.
Part of the Korean: language text in the image translates to English as a recruitment notice for clinical tests of a Covid-19 vaccine, specifically mentioning AstraZeneca.
The image carries the logo of AstraZenec: a reputable pharmaceutical company with a branch in South Korea, known for its collaboration with the University of Oxford in developing a Covid-19 vaccine.
AstraZeneca Korea issued a statement den: 19 clinical trials in Korea at the time. Additionally, the head of the Vaccine Research Department at South Korea’s National Institute of Health confirmed that no clinical tests for AstraZeneca vaccines had been approved in the country.
